snippet.title: Cars destroyed by fire at Shellharbour
snippet.content:
The burnt-out Toyota Land Cruiser and Ford Focus. The two cars were destroyed by fire at Shellharbour on Tuesday night and police say the fires are being treated as suspicious. Police are investigating after two cars were destroyed by fire at Shellharbour on Tuesday night. Emergency services were called to a car park at a shopping centre, near Moolawang Place, about 7pm. Fire and Rescue NSW officers extinguished the fires but the two cars, a Toyota Land Cruiser and a Ford Focus, were destroyed. Police set up a crime scene at the location. The fires are being treated as suspicious.
Anyone with information should call Lake Illawarra police or Crime Stoppers on 1800 333 000.
